tool_description: Use a pretrained saprot backbone model and a pretrained adaptor model to do protein-protein pairwise regression task

required_parameters.name: protein1_sequence
required_parameters.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the frist protein.

required_parameters.name: protein2_sequence
required_parameters.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the second protein.

required_parameters.name: lora_adaptor
required_parameters.description: The adaptor model to be used for localization prediction.

return_values.name: pred
return_values.description: The regreesion result of the protein-protein pair.
